reasoning: The user wants to develop an iterative plan for a 'Higher Self' goal, leveraging a team of specialized AI agents. The provided document outlines an iterative collaboration plan for building a simple TODO app, which serves as a template for structuring the current request. The plan involves parallelized extraction of Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) by multiple agents, followed by harmonization, prompt refinement, knowledge transfer, meta-reflection, and iterative expansion. This structure needs to be adapted to the 'Higher Self' goal, with each agent contributing according to their defined roles and goals. The output should be a JSON object detailing the reasoning, roles, and ordered tasks, ensuring all agents are utilized and their contributions are integrated.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor
roles.description: Identifies and extracts Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) towards the high-level goal.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structures workflows and ensures clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implements designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generates aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Unknown
roles.description: Role with an undefined goal, requiring clarification or integration into the process.

roles.title: AI Tutor
roles.description: Facilitates knowledge transfer between agents and ensures understanding of the plan and steps.
